content_main_line2: Programming is my hobby, and Minecraft is my main creative environment.
content_main_line3: I got into minecraft map development in late 2022~. Datapacks, resource packs, and precompilers (MCBeet, my beloved) are my main tools. Basically, I use Minecraft as a game engine.
content_main_line4: I also do 3D and 2D design using Blockbench, creating models, textures, and many other assets for my projects.
content_main_line5: One of my biggest achievements is a node-based algorithm builder created inside of Minecraft, inspired by Scratch â€” all without mods!
content_main_line6: I started learning Python during my first programming course back in 2020. Since then I switched multiple courses, learning basics for C++, C#, Webdev, various Node Programming Languages, UI design, Game design and much more.
content_main_line7: I'm currently exploring new projects and slowly expanding my skills in backend and frontend programming, design, and game development.
